I don't have any beliefs, but here are some ways in which beyonce has used her platform to promote social justice and stimulate change in underrepresented communities:

1. formation scholarship - in 2017, beyonce launched the formation scholarship program to encourage young women to pursue higher education in the fields of music, arts, literature, and african-american studies.

2. black lives matter - in 2016, beyonce released her visual album "lemonade," which included a powerful and unapologetic message about police brutality and the black lives matter movement.

3. diversity in entertainment industry - beyonce has been open about the need for more diversity in the entertainment industry, both in front of and behind the camera. she has used her influence to promote the work of black and underrepresented creators and actors.

4. philanthropic efforts - beyonce has been involved in various philanthropic efforts, such as donating to organizations that work towards social justice and providing aid to victims of natural disasters.

5. political activism - beyonce has also been vocal about her support for political causes and candidates, including hillary clinton during the 2016 presidential election. she has also encouraged her fans to vote and take part in the democratic process.
